<h3 id="X32118">X(32118) = INCENTER OF THE 1st ORTHOSYMMEDIAL TRIANGLE</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*((b+c)*a^4+2*b*c*a^3+(b+c)*b*c*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b^3-c^3))  :  :
<br>
<b>X(32118) = 3*X(354)-2*X(4353) = 3*X(354)-X(12721) = X(3663)+2*X(21848) = 2*X(3821)-3*X(5883) = 3*X(5902)-X(24248) = 3*X(10176)-4*X(24295)</b>
<p>X(32118) lies on these lines:
{1,572}, {3,25065}, {4,15314}, {21,16566}, {31,1726}, {33,57}, {46,24309}, {51,2844}, {58,3497}, {65,516}, {72,17355}, {226,12618}, {251,32116}, {354,4353}, {405,25081}, {517,12722}, {518,2321}, {527,24476}, {726,2901}, {758,3923}, {761,29044}, {942,3663}, {971,24471}, {984,3730}, {991,7146}, {1009,25078}, {1011,25080}, {1210,12610}, {1400,1736}, {1451,1825}, {1469,2801}, {1721,2955}, {1746,26000}, {1753,23052}, {1764,11031}, {1770,29050}, {1781,4223}, {1876,3668}, {2352,16577}, {2690,2711}, {2809,3751}, {2825,12294}, {2831,5480}, {2838,18907}, {3671,21629}, {3729,3868}, {3754,4660}, {3812,18252}, {3821,5883}, {4329,5807}, {4356,11997}, {4463,5294}, {5256,20243}, {5884,29057}, {5902,24248}, {8094,12728}, {9021,17351}, {9532,19161}, {10158,19744}, {10176,24295}, {10319,10382}, {10572,29024}, {11221,19732}, {11529,12717}, {12445,12727}, {12652,18421}, {17132,24473}, {18389,29069}</p>
<p>
X(32118) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these lines: {i,j}: {65, 12723}, {942, 21848}, {3729, 3868}<br>
X(32118) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (72, 17355), (3663, 942), (4660, 3754), (12721, 4353), (18252, 3812)<br>
X(32118) = {X(354), X(12721)}-harmonic conjugate of X(4353)<br>
</p>
